document_data.mainbody:
Dhaunryl Zalimbar was a mage inhabiting the city of Waterdeep during the midâ€“1360s DR.
Dhaunryl was tall and had a kind demeanor though he was very shy. He greatly preferred studying and poring over books to putting himself in danger by adventuring.
He worked as a service-mage in Auroras Realms Shop, Street of Tusks Catalogue Counter within Waterdeeps Trades Ward. Dhaunryl enjoyed collecting heraldic devices and sketching other such badges he saw in Waterdeep. He memorized all mottos he came across.
